title: Legacy Of Kain Soul Reaver1 PC-CompactedPortable
description:
Hi to all PC games fans and in particularly to the Legacy of Kain addicts ...


This file have the Legacy of Kain Deficiance game in a single executable
that can be used by compacted portability method, more information below ...



This is the instructions to run the game :


run CompactedPortableStarter and in about 30 seconds
the game will start 

after playing and quitting game the saves will be at
the savegames.her file on the game folder and the executable
is deleted 



GETTING THE COMPACTED PORTABLE EXECUTABLE OUT OPTION

is a procedure to get the portable executable to quick launch 
that it is after the game start with the options selector copy
the 539 Mb executable to the desktop for example and now you can
play by quick launch, if you donÃ‚Â´t mind to wait about 30 seconds
before the game start then the 267 Mb compacted portable version is ok ...

is up to you ...


Happy game ...
